name: Sneaky Present
description:
Oh No!  Someone lost the gift they were going to give their Secret Santa!

Is that their Christmas tree?  Is that SATAN?!?!  We'd better not get spotted!

You are a gift, and must sneak around the demonic beasts as they go about their guard duty, to hide beneath the Christmas tree, with all the other presents, in this entry in the 2018 Extra Credits Christmas Game Jam.

Mostly feature-complete, but only one level so far.

(Added .ZIP version on Dec20th - no programmatic changes)
